definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Chinese man gets death penalty for murdering 13.
sentences.chinese: 杀13人通缉犯成瑞龙佛山获死刑。

sentences.english: This week, Serbia arrested one of Europe's most wanted men.
sentences.chinese: 本周塞尔威压逮捕了欧洲头号通缉犯。

sentences.english: The wanted man dived into an alley to escape from the police.
sentences.chinese: 那个通缉犯潜进一条小巷躲避警察的追捕。

sentences.english: It was fixed to the plaster next to the postmaster's window, the place of honor usually reserved for the Wanted posters.
sentences.chinese: 通常这个“荣誉之所”是给通缉犯们预留的位置。

sentences.english: SanJuanKid 41 minutes ago "12 years later, China's most-wanted sent back."
sentences.chinese: 12年后，中国的头号通缉犯被遣返。

sentences.english: “Now the Forbes list has become the wanted list, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “现在福布斯富豪榜已经成了通缉犯名单，”他说。

sentences.english: Warrants are out for the arrest of two men wanted in connection with the murder.
sentences.chinese: 已发出逮捕令捉拿涉嫌谋杀案的两个通缉犯。

sentences.english: Are you on america's most wanted?

definition: to order the arrest of sb as criminal/to list as wanted
escaped criminal/fugitive from the law (criminal suspect on the run)
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Xing2 jing3 Zu3 zhi1
